spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem with 4% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec.

Whenever enemies within 23 yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal 100% of the damage dealt back to attacker.

Burrow beneath the ground, becoming unattackable, removing movement impairing effects, and increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

When the effect ends, enemies within 6 yards are knocked in the air and take 579,376 Physical damage.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 205,039 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 204,531 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 204,840 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 60% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 149,442 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 148,744 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 145,353 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Astral Shift reduces damage taken by an additional 20%.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Chills the target with frost, causing 160,164 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,515 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 614,490 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.1 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 316,023 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 716,621 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 7% or Mastery by 14% for 10 sec.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 248,868 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 24 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning by 10%.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

Flame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Lightning Bolt or Tempest: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Lava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 457,281 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning, Tempest, or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Stormkeeper by 2.0 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 12 sec.

Tempest, Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake make your target a Lightning Rod for 12 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 12% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Increases the duration of Lightning Rod by 4 sec and its damage bonus by 25%.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Every 300 Maelstrom spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.

Spending Maelstrom grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.

You have a chance to get struck by lightning, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec. The effectiveness is increased to 100% in outdoor areas.

You call down a Thunderstorm when you Reincarnate.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 50% chance to cause an additional Elemental Overload.

Tempest causes your next 2 Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt spells to be instant cast and deal 40% increased damage.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Gain one stack of Stormkeeper every 50 sec.
Earthquake and Chain Lightning damage increased by 5%.
Lightning Rod targets now also take 12% of the damage that Tempest deals, and Tempest also applies Lightning Rod effect.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 192,987 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 203,938 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 206,307 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 202,996 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 60% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 148,464 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 147,958 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 148,853 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 159,911 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.

While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,665 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 614,490 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst casts restore 1,750 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.1 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 316,023 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 595,607 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 248,868 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 24 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning by 10%.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

Flame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Lightning Bolt or Tempest: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Lava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 459,982 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning, Tempest, or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by 6.5% for 1 hour.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 772,838 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Your Ancestors' spells are 25% more powerful.
Ancestors last an additional 4 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental and Storm Elemental by 5 sec.
Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 25.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.

Increases the damage of Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake by 15%.

Increases the healing of Healing Surge and Chain Heal by 25%.
When an Ancestor departs, they cast Elemental Blast at a nearby enemy.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 205,207 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 204,795 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Your Feral Spirits are now imbued with Fire, Frost, or Lightning, increasing your damage dealt with that element by 10%, but now only increase your Physical damage dealt by 10%.
